block1.date-info-text: For the demonstration, the following date have been chosen as the current one:

intro.title: Hello there!
intro.intro-text: This project implements a student dashboard and a calendar that displays the lesson schedule.
intro.description-text:
The project was created to demonstrate the interaction between React web application and Redux state manager: 
when changing the current authorized user, the data in the student dashboard and the calendar are updated.

student-dashboard-description.title: Student dashboard
student-dashboard-description.text: There is a dashboard with widgets that display up-to-date lesson information for each registered student.

schedule-description.title: Schedule of online school
schedule-description.text: The calendar displays data about available school lessons for the student.

lessons-legend.green-lesson: a lesson in the current course
lessons-legend.white-lesson: a lesson in a course that has already been completed or not yet started
lessons-legend.purple-lesson: the first lesson in each course
